Package stocker.controller.watchlist

Class WatchlistController

  • java.lang.Object
    • stocker.controller.general.ControllerBase
      • stocker.controller.general.ControllerBaseInternal
        • stocker.controller.watchlist.WatchlistController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener, PropertiesFrameListener
    public class WatchlistController
extends ControllerBaseInternal
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    The Watchlist Controller class is responsible for receiving, generating and processing watchlist view events and, if necessary, manipulating data in the model.
    Author:
    Christoph Kaplan
